dependencies.description:
LightGBM is a gradient boosting framework that uses tree based learning
algorithms.

dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.
dependencies.name: py-networkx

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.description:
The PyMongo distribution contains tools for interacting with MongoDB
database from Python. The bson package is an implementation of the BSON
format for Python. The pymongo package is a native Python driver for
MongoDB. The gridfs package is a gridfs implementation on top of
pymongo.
dependencies.name: py-pymongo

dependencies.description: A set of python modules for machine learning and data mining.
dependencies.name: py-scikit-learn

dependencies.description: Fundamental algorithms for scientific computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-scipy

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

description:
Hyperopt is a Python library for serial and parallel optimization over
awkward search spaces, which may include real-valued, discrete, and
conditional dimensions.
name: py-hyperopt

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
